attributes.action: either significantly increase the funding and the size of the armed forces so that they are capable of performing the tasks required of them or you withdraw them from all conflict zones.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the people beleive that the armed forces should be large enough and properly equiped to perform the tasks you request of them. They are real people with real lives. They are not political pawns. Show them the respect they deserve. Give them what they need to do what you ask or ask for nothing.
